description.p:
This addon implements the opened platform called Open Toutatice (which one is based on the Nuxeo DM distribution)
Bug fixes : * #3802 - Prise en compte de la date de publication dans requêtes de type Listes * #3540 - Intégration HF 12 de Nuxeo (index proxies, page providers) * Multi-levels vocabularies cycles
Main features : * Integration HF12-1.0.1 * Widget filtering on permission on current document * Remote sections informations available for Portal * Suggest Users Widget filtering on permission on current document
